(OK FINE!!)

THis post stands as the post. No more corrections.

Diamond::

She landed the pod safely into the hanger bay as the pod glided down 
in autopilot. She waited untill the pod had landed and was shut down 
before leaving the pod. She walked out of the hanger bay and and went 
to the mess hall. She ordered a large glass of liquid gold energon an 
downed the whole glass in one gulp.  Feeling refreshed, she opened 
her link. "ZARDUS, I am home and have complete my mission. I am 
waiting for an audiance with you when you are redy. Contact me when 
you can." She shut off her link and ordered another drink.  She 
smiled and planned to put her container with the remains of the GREAT 
KITKAT on a wall in her room.  She was glad she had another leader's 
death under her resume.
